MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.UIElement owner) cil managed

Docs.param: The that is associated with this .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer CreatePeerForElement(class System.Windows.UIElement element) cil managed

Docs.param: The that is associated with this .
Docs.summary: Creates a for the specified .
Docs.returns: The created for the specified .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>. The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback. If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.

Docs.summary: Gets the for the specified .
Docs.returns: The ; or , if the was not created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetItemStatusCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the that is associated with this . This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>.
Docs.returns: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus%2A> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetItemTypeCore() cil managed

Docs.returns: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType%2A> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer GetLabeledByCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the for the element that is targeted to the for this . This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.
Docs.returns: The for the element that is targeted to the for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be. If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetNameCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the text label of the that is associated with this . This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
Docs.returns: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to. Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsControlElementCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the that is associated with this is understood by the end user as interactive. Optionally, the user might understand the as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsKeyboardFocusableCore() cil managed

Docs.returns: if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsOffscreenCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the that is associated with this is off the screen. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>.
Docs.returns: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. In this case the method returns `false`.
